intro: Steganthera schlechteri, commonly known as the African orchid or African violet, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the orchid family, Orchidaceae, and is characterized by its compact growth habit and attractive, showy flowers. The plant typically features dense, velvety foliage and produces small, clustered blooms in shades of white, pink, and purple. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot. Steganthera schlechteri is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
